chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall (l : list (Term A n) * list (Term A n)) (l3 l4 : list (Term A n)), plusP (fst l) (snd l) l3 -> plusP (fst l) (snd l) l4 -> l3 = l4

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
mult_mon : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d
Inductive plusP : list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop := nillu1 : forall l1 : list (Term A n), plusP (pO A n) l1 l1 | nillu2 : forall l1 : list (Term A n), plusP l1 (pO A n) l1 | mainu1 : forall (a1 a2 : Term A n) (l1 l2 l3 : list (Term A n)), ltT (A:=A) ltM a2 a1 -> plusP l1 (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a2 l2) l3 -> plusP (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a1 l1) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a2 l2) (pX (
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
OrderStructure : forall A : Type, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> (A -> A -> A) -> Prop
zero_mon : forall d : nat, mon d
snd : ?A * ?B -> ?B where ?A : [A : Type A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Type]
Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope
CoefStructure : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A), A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) -> Prop
fst : ?A * ?B -> ?A where ?A : [A : Type A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Type]
EnvRing.Pc : ?C -> EnvRing.Pol ?C where ?C : [A : Type A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Type]
EnvRing.Pinj : BinNums.positive -> EnvRing.Pol ?C -> EnvRing.Pol ?C where ?C : [A : Type A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Type]
EnvRing.PX : EnvRing.Pol ?C -> BinNums.positive -> EnvRing.Pol ?C -> EnvRing.Pol ?C where ?C : [A : Type A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Type]
eqPf : forall (A : Type) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop), (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (pq : list (Term A n) * list (Term A n)), {eqP A eqA n (fst pq) (snd pq)} + {~ eqP A eqA n (fst pq) (snd pq)}
eqp_imp_canonical : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (p q : list (Term A n)), eqP A eqA n p q -> canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> canonical A0 eqA ltM q
canonical_skip_fst : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall (l : list (Term A n)) (a b : Term A n), canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b l)) -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a l)
ltP_refl_pX : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall (a : Term A n) (p : list (Term A n)), canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) -> ltP (A:=A) ltM p (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p)
ltP_pX_canonical : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop), (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (a : Term A n) (p : list (Term A n)), canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ltP (A:=A) ltM p (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pO A n)) -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p)
ltT_dec : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), (forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}) -> forall x y : Term A n, {ltT (A:=A) ltM x y} + {ltT (A:=A) ltM y x} + {eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) x y}
nzeroP_comp_eqTerm : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b
olist_imp_olist : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall (l : list (Term A n)) (a b : Term A n), olist (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b l)) -> olist (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a l)
zeroP_dec : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop), (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (x : Term A n), {zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) x} + {~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) x}
eqp_refl : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall n : nat, reflexive (list (Term A n)) (eqP A eqA n)
eqTerm_refl : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall n : nat, reflexive (Term A n) (eqTerm eqA (n:=n))
eqTerm_dec : forall (A : Type) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop), (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (x y : Term A n), {eqTerm eqA (n:=n) x y} + {~ eqTerm eqA (n:=n) x y}
canonical_pX_eqT : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (a b : Term A n) (p : list (Term A n)), canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) -> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b p)
olist_cons : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (l : list (Term A n)) (a b : Term A n), ltT (A:=A) ltM b a -> olist (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b l) -> olist (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b l))
plusp : forall l : list (Term A n) * list (Term A n), {a : list (Term A n) | plusP (fst l) (snd l) a}
canonical_imp_canonical : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (l : list (Term A n)) (a : Term A n), canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a l) -> canonical A0 eqA ltM l
ltP_order_comp : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall (a b c : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), ltP (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a q) -> ltT (A:=A) ltM a c -> ltT (A:=A) ltM b c
canonical_pX_order : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (l : list (Term A n)) (a b : Term A n), canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b l)) -> ltT (A:=A) ltM b a
not_double_canonical : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall (a : Term A n) (p : list (Term A n)), ~ canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p))
plus_minus_le : forall a b : nat, a - b + b = a -> b <= a
T1_is_min_ltT : forall (A : Type) (A1 : A) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall a : Term A n, ~ ltT (A:=A) ltM a (T1 A1 n)
eqp_eqTerm : forall (A : Type) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (a b : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), eqP A eqA n (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b
olist_pX_order : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (l : list (Term A n)) (a b : Term A n), olist (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b l)) -> ltT (A:=A) ltM b a
canonical_nzeroP : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (a : Term A n) (p : list (Term A n)), canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a
olist_X : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (l : list (Term A n)) (a : Term A n), olist (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a l) -> olist (A:=A) ltM l
plusP_inv : forall (p q l : list (Term A n)) (a b : Term A n), plusP (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) l -> exists l1 : list (Term A n), ltT (A:=A) ltM b a /\ plusP p (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) l1 /\ l = pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a l1 \/ ltT (A:=A) ltM a b /\ plusP (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) q l1 /\ l = pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b l1 \/ eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b /\ (zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b) /\ plusP p q l...
mainu2a : forall (a1 a2 : Term A n) (l1 l2 l3 : list (Term A n)), plusP l1 l2 l3 -> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a1 a2 -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a1 a2) -> plusP (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a1 l1) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a2 l2) l3
canonical_imp_olist : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (a : list (Term A n)), canonical A0 eqA ltM a -> olist (A:=A) ltM a
eqp_inv3r : forall (A : Type) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (a b : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), eqP A eqA n (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) -> eqP A eqA n p q
canonical_pX_ltP : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (a : Term A n) (p : list (Term A n)), canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) -> ltP (A:=A) ltM p (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pO A n))
plusP_ind : forall P : list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop, (forall l1 : list (Term A n), P (pO A n) l1 l1) -> (forall l1 : list (Term A n), P l1 (pO A n) l1) ->...-> P l l0 l1
plusP_sind : forall P : list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> SProp, (forall l1 : list (Term A n), P (pO A n) l1 l1) -> (forall l1 : list (Term A n), P l1 (pO A n) l1) ->...-> P l l0 l1
mainu2b : forall (a1 a2 : Term A n) (l1 l2 l3 : list (Term A n)), plusP l1 l2 l3 -> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a1 a2 -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a1 a2) -> plusP (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a1 l1) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a2 l2) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a1 a2) l3)
ltT_eqTr : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (a b c : Term A n), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> ltT (A:=A) ltM a c -> ltT (A:=A) ltM b c
ltT_eqTl : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (a b c : Term A n), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> ltT (A:=A) ltM c a -> ltT (A:=A) ltM c b
eqT_compat_ltTl : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (a b c : Term A n), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) b c -> ltT (A:=A) ltM b a -> ltT (A:=A) ltM c a
canonicalp1 : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (a : Term A n), ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pO A n))

inversion H1; inversion H2; subst.

original: intros l l3 l4 H1 H2. inversion H1; inversion H2; subst. - reflexivity. - discriminate. - discriminate. - reflexivity.
